channel.title: Pi source. 317. autosave?
channel.description:
Pi 317
Is this what chooses when my players autosave?
[code]public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 120; // save every 1 minute[/code]

Is this what chooses when my players autosave?

Read full topic

item.title: Pi source. 317. autosave?
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

sonsofgod2:

but hiow come when i turn my server off by like shutting it off by hand or auto restarter set like it comes back werre they last logged on.

That would be called a rollback. You can change the “SAVE_TIMER = 120” to “SAVE_TIMER = 90” to help with the rollbacks but I don’t know how to fix them.

An auto-restarter does what it’s intended to do, it automatically restarts the server but it doesnt auto-save.

Read full topic
